actions.text: Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

official_title: To reduce the duty on diuron and linuron.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1992, the duty on: (1) 3-(3, 4-dichlorophenyl)-1, 1-dimethylurea (also known as diuron); and (2) 3-(3,4-dichlorophenyl)-1, 1-methyl, 1-methoxyurea (also known as linuron).

titles.title: To reduce the duty on diuron and linuron.
